rows.label: tlk43300011_05_msg0001
rows.name:
You know how Blades and Drivers
develop a relationship over time?

rows.label: tlk43300011_05_msg0002
rows.name:
The more you fight and the more
experience you gain, the closer
the two of you will become.

rows.label: tlk43300011_05_msg0003
rows.name:
You'll probably be best buddies
in no time at all. But see...

rows.label: tlk43300011_05_msg0004
rows.name:
In reality, it goes
much deeper than that.

rows.label: tlk43300011_05_msg0005
rows.name:
If you keep on fighting together, for
longer than you care to count...

rows.label: tlk43300011_05_msg0006
rows.name:
then you'll create a bond deeper
than you ever thought possible!

rows.label: tlk43300011_05_msg0007
rows.name:
Not that I've ever seen a
Blade and Driver with such
a deep connection myself...

rows.label: tlk43300011_05_msg0008
rows.name:
But it's what my old man told me,
and I don't doubt his wisdom.
